long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension that supercharges your twitter experience. Some features available:
- Save Advanced Twitter Searches
- Keep Track of Profiles visited and search with keywords you remember
- Keep Track of Tweets read and search with keywords you remember
- Keep Track of interesting links you've come across
- Bookmark tweets, profiles, organize into folders and tags
